SSH_BRUTE_FORCE.name: SSH Brute Force Attack
SSH_BRUTE_FORCE.description: A brute force attack attempts to gain unauthorized access by repeatedly trying different passwords.
SSH_BRUTE_FORCE.why_detected: Multiple failed SSH login attempts were detected from the same IP address within a short time period.
SSH_BRUTE_FORCE.learning_note: SOC teams commonly detect brute force attacks using threshold-based rules.
